message: Accept this generous offer and we can split the money quickly!
Meet me halfway, let's be fair!
You're getting close to meeting me halfway, but I'm willing to give you a slight edge. Consider this a compromise!
You're giving me a slight edge, now it's my turn to counter with a slight edge of my own!
I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, but this time I'll take a slightly smaller share. Can we finally agree on a deal?
You're getting closer to meeting me in the middle, but I think I can do better than that!
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, exactly. Let's split the money 50/50 and end this!
